title: Web-Developer
whyMeText: I am a passionate web developer who is always seeking new challenges. I am quick to get up to speed on complex projects and expand them further. This makes me a valuable member of your team.
commentHead: need a Team Player? Here is what others say about me:
contactInfo: Still not sure if I am the right person for your projects? Contact me to convince you. Let us work together
policyText2: and agree to the proceesing of my data as outlined.
submissionSuccess: Your Mail is on its way

project1.name: El Pollo Loco
project1.description: A Fun little browser-game where you defeat a giant Chicken with salsa

project2.name: Join
project2.description: A Web-app with Databank to organize and visualize Team projects

project3.description: Collection of the 1.Gen Pokemon using Rest API

project4.name: KanMind

project5.name: Coderr
project5.description: A Backend-Database, for a Service platform written with Django_Rest_Framework

comment1.name: Mailo Mittelstädt
comment1.title: JOIN
comment1.comment: Jonas is a valuable member in group work, as he consistently brings a positive attitude and a lot of motivation. He contributes innovative ideas and encourages active communication within the team, fostering a lively exchange.

comment2.name: Joel Sygulla
comment2.title: JOIN
comment2.comment: It was a great asset to have Jonas as a team colleague on our Join project. He successfully carried out his tasks and was a pleasure to work with due to his friendly and courteous manner. Jonas has strong technical knowledge, good communication skills, and was always helpful. He was truly a pleasure to work with, and I can recommend him without a doubt.

comment3.name: Alexander Hähnlein
comment3.title: JOIN
comment3.comment: Jonas did an excellent job handling his tasks in our group project 'Join' (Kanban board). He was engaged and integrated well into the team, actively contributing to the project. His reliability and teamwork made working with him very pleasant. I’m happy to recommend him.

text.H3.Text: The following notes provide a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website. Personal data is any data with which you can be personally identified. For detailed information on the subject of data protection, please refer to our privacy policy listed below this text.
text.H4_1.Text: Who is responsible for data collection on this website?
text.P1: The data processing on this website is carried out by the website operator. You can find their contact details in the section 'Notice on the Responsible Party' in this privacy policy.
text.H4_2: How do we collect your data?
text.P2: On the one hand, your data is collected by you providing it to us. This could, for example, be data you enter in a contact form.
text.P3: Other data is collected automatically or with your consent when you visit the website by our IT systems. This primarily includes technical data (e.g., internet browser, operating system, or time of page access). The collection of this data occurs automatically as soon as you enter this website.
text.H4_3: What do we use your data for?
text.P4: Part of the data is collected to ensure the error-free provision of the website. Other data can be used to analyze your user behavior.
text.H4_4: What rights do you have regarding your data?
text.P5: You have the right to receive information about the origin, recipient, and purpose of your stored personal data at any time free of charge. You also have the right to request the correction or deletion of this data. If you have given consent to data processing, you can revoke this consent at any time for the future. Additionally, you have the right to request the restriction of the processing of your personal data under certain circumstances. Furthermore, you have the right to lodge a complaint with the competent supervisory authority.
text.P6: For this and other questions regarding data protection, you can contact us at any time.
text.P7: We host the content of our website with the following provider:
text.P8: The provider is ALL-INKL.COM - Neue Medien Münnich, Inh. René Münnich, Hauptstraße 68, 02742 Friedersdorf (hereinafter All-Inkl). You can find more details in All-Inkl's privacy policy: https://all-inkl.com/datenschutzinformationen/.
text.P9: The use of All-Inkl is based on Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR. We have a legitimate interest in a reliable presentation of our website. If consent has been requested, the processing is carried out exclusively on the basis of Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR and § 25(1) TDDDG.
